electric-sql/pglite

run Postgres in browser or Node with WASM

Related repos

  • Embeds SQLite databases in PostgreSQL tables
  • Database client for PostgreSQL, MariaDB, and SQLite
  • PostgreSQL playground running in a browser via WASM
  • Postgres platform for running apps and services inside the database
  • test postgres like sqlite, no docker needed
  • serves a REST API from a PostgreSQL database
  • Pip-installable embedded Postgres server for Python apps
  • Web-based management tool for PostgreSQL
